name: Week 1
author: Mwangi
content: Wow not what I expected, the race is on to be a software engineer. Things are starting to get intense so now I have to switch to turbo mode. Still excited for the coming weeks.

name: End of week 1
author: Mwangi
content: Things are starting to make more sense. By doing self-evaluation its obvious my programming skills have had a great impact because as of now I have worked on atleast 7 websites that are fully functional, but I think I need to work more on my design skills.
